The Antares Circular ITAD Blueprint

UK-specific circular blueprint. Redeploy -> Recover -> Upcycle: UK permits, assay-verification, ESG-graded lifecycle reporting ‚Äî all mapped for UK tax up-lift and WRAP circular accelerator cycles.

Permitted downstream sorting partners span Bow (EA ATF permit holder), Fawley Down (REEs site recovery), and Sheffield (glass & metals treatment).

‚úùÔ∏è Zero-Landfill Policy

Ship-to-point diversion. Zero recyclates routed to landfill or incinerators. All mid-stage outputs dispatched to permitted closed-loop operators within the following stream: polymers, rare earths, glass, gold (Au).

WEEE Downstream Disassembly

Manual & robotic disassembly lines enable recovery homogeneity within strict EA Permit operation rules. Handling ladder spans WEEE 1‚Äì10 weight codes per EA-ATF landfill exemption rules.

1

1. Optical Infrastructure ID & Sorting

Automated teardown via cross-belt optical XRF scanners (D1200 Series), RFID tagging for full chain-of-materials-level traceability, and OEM-level BOM to downstream recycling profiles at permitted EA-ATF destination (Bow).

2

2. Manual Channel Disassembly (CNI-grade Bays)

Targeted disassembly of GPU & HPC interfacial boards (NVIDIA DGX 900 Series, AMD EPYC), opposite non-invasive (rBat 200) extractions of lithium polymer cells (HMG IS5 hard-zone blasting protocol compliant).

3

3. BA (Base Alloys) Magnetic / Eddy Current Handling

Magnetic sorting via proprietary rotor & drum systems (standard for ISRI Tin/Boron). Eddy current edge separator (EC130) upgraded downstream densimetric path (replacing Bateman spiral) SRT, extraction coatings minimised, Al metametal <0.5% oxide content.

4

4. Final Gravity Air & Laser ABA Process

Exotic glass & silicon (GPU wafers) treated via Honeywell‚Äôs electrostatic separation (FES 48). Automated laser film (support/contextual adhesion) for plastic recovery >98% weight-off final torque.
